title: Photographs And Typewritten Statement, 20th century
description: Ten plates, five of which show black and white photographs; five explain in typewritten statements the Yuki Tsumugi technique: a folk art silk weaving technique originating from the Muromachi period (14-16th century).

tombstone.epitaph:
Photographs And Typewritten Statement, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: cardboard, cellophane, sensitized paper. Given by Tsumugiya Kichihei. 1966-29-1-a/j.
